DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study test comprehensive , male-oriented , online screen referral ( Screening Mental Health ; SMH ) male-oriented online information referral intervention program ( Man Therapy ; MT ) improve mental health wellbeing focus prevention suicide help-seeking behavior among middle-aged men . The online program offer together maximize effect reduce suicide behavior increase mental health help-seeking behavior men . If successful decrease suicide behavior ideation increase suicide help-seeking behavior , intervention could scale contribute reduction suicide behavior deaths across country .
DOC.brief_title: Assessing Online Interventions Men 's ' Mental Health Wellbeing
